column4: can anyone tell me what the deal is with xserver-xorg-core not allowing me to open XServer?
can anyone tell me what the deal is with xserver-xorg-core not allowing me to open XServer?
I am just wondering how to keep people from trying to install the auto update

if I try to use those both, GDM will not start.
I finally pulled the AGP and put in an old Matrox 450

I think I already have it installed, just not the default
good luck though, hope it helps
